item.description:
The trail is 11 miles from Alewife to Bedford and we ride at a moderate pace.This event auto-repeats monthly and may be leaderless. You may rsvp 10 days in advance.

Lunch afterwards at Not Your Average Joes, 645 Mass Ave.

Suggested donation $1 for Meetup fees.

Wear a helmet, bring water and sunscreen, watch out for children on the trail, and have a good time!

 

The Minuteman Bikeway passes through the historic area where the American Revolution began in April 1775.

Today, the Minuteman Bikeway is one of the most popular and successful rail-trails in the United States, enjoyed for both healthy recreation and transportation.

The bikeway has become a new type of “Main Street” where neighbors and strangers alike come together while riding, walking, or skating on the path.

In 2008, Rails-to-Trails Conservancy inducted the Minuteman Bikeway into the national Rail-Trail Hall of Fame.
item.name: Minuteman Bike Trail, Arlington to Bedford, 1st Sunday @ 10:30
